main.name: Aamosh Dahal
main.description: I am a student at Caldwell University and I aim to become a Web Developer. I like developing with Node and React.
main.bio: Currently a sophomore. I recently started developing with React. I have successfully completed my first project, and I am currently working on its design.

education.description: Graduated my +2 from this institute. I am happy that I joined the institute.
Graduated my Bachelors Degree from this institute. I am happy that I joined the institute.

work.title: IT Senior Tech
work.description: A senior technological assistant for my univeristy.

projects.title: Gas Station Finder
projects.description: A simple MEN stack app powered by Google Maps API, that gives you a list of Gas Station based on your location along with the direction to direction to reach there from your current position.
